headline: Cloud AI Update - Intuitive.ai and Matilda Cloud Join Forces to Transform Life Sciences
summary: A recent strategic partnership between Intuitive.ai and Matilda Cloud has been formed to enhance AI and cloud modernization efforts within the Life Sciences sector. This collaboration aims to address challenges such as rising infrastructure costs and limited visibility into risk by providing actionable intelligence for rapid execution. Through this partnership, Life Sciences organizations gain compliance-ready insights into AI costs, security, and modernization pathways, enabling them to make...

headline: Argano Strengthens AI and Technology Integration Capabilities with Acquisition of Advantco
summary: PLANO, Texas, January 20, 2026--Argano, the world’s first and largest Global Specialist Consultancy exclusively focused on the design and delivery of High-Performance Business Operations with an AI-forward approach to transformation, today announced the acquisition of Advantco International, LLC ("Advantco"), a leader in SAP and Oracle integration solutions, from Montage Partners. The transaction deepens Argano’s enterprise connectivity expertise, enhances its AI-driven transformation capabiliti

content.title: Argano Strengthens AI and Technology Integration Capabilities with Acquisition of Advantco
content.summary: PLANO, Texas, January 20, 2026--Argano, the world’s first and largest Global Specialist Consultancy exclusively focused on the design and delivery of High-Performance Business Operations with an AI-forward approach to transformation, today announced the acquisition of Advantco International, LLC ("Advantco"), a leader in SAP and Oracle integration solutions, from Montage Partners. The transaction deepens Argano’s enterprise connectivity expertise, enhances its AI-driven transformation capabiliti

headline: Montage Partners Announces Successful Exit of its Investment in Advantco International
summary: Montage Partners, a people-first private equity firm based in Scottsdale, Arizona, today announced the successful exit of its investment in Advantco International, LLC (the "Company"), a global provider of integration software solutions that enable seamless connectivity between enterprise applications and cloud platforms. The Company was acquired by Argano LLC, a portfolio company of Trinity Hunt Partners, LP.
